body:
So after some though and speaking with my friends, I decided I'm not going to start a new channel, but just go by a new name. My name will be "ItzSean" from now on, but the link can't be changed. Hopefully the new names works, even though the channel link is still going to be http://www.youtube.com/user/LegoSean9

====================  ORIGINAL POST ========================
All right, I have finally decided that I've kinda got over this account, and everything associated with it.
I have decided to create a new account, and start fresh. If possible, I'll try my best to get my stats carried over to my new minecraft account (If I end up getting one) on as many servers as possible.
I am also, almost definately going to restart my youtube channel, my new one is https://www.youtube.com/user/ItzSeanPvP so please go and subscribe IF YOU'RE GOING TO BE ACTIVE! I really have started to dislike my name, and legosean9 doesn't fit me at all, so my new name is "ItzSean" or "ItzSeanPvP" I believe it seems less "childish" and will hopefully workout better.

Please leave your thoughts below, I would love to hear what you think.
